nodes.description: 2012年12月，ANP领导人Bashir Ahmad Bilour在巴基斯坦俾路支省普什图瓦尔遭自杀式炸弹袭击身亡
nodes.support_text: In December 2012, Bashir Ahmad Bilour, leader of ANP and Haroon Bilour's father, was killed by a suicide bomber.

nodes.description: 2013年4月16日，TTP在ANP选举集会发动自杀袭击，目标为Haroon Bilour但未成功
nodes.support_text: On 16 April 2013, a suicide attack claimed by Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) on ANP election rally that targeted Haroon Bilour, killed 15 people. However, Haroon Bilour was not at the rally.

nodes.description: 2018年7月10日晚，Haroon Bilour在Peshawar Yaka Toot地区ANP集会现场遭遇自杀式爆炸
nodes.support_text: On late night 10 July 2018, Haroon Bilour arrived at Yakatoot area in Peshawar where ANP workers had gathered for a corner meeting. As his vehicle arrived, a loud explosion occurred.

nodes.description: 爆炸后8小时，Lady Reading医院确认死亡人数从13人上升至21人
nodes.support_text: Initially the death toll was 13 but later it rose to 21 according to Lady Reading Hospital officials.

nodes.description: 7月12日，ANP支持者在Bilour住宅外抗议政府安保不力
nodes.support_text: ANP supporters gathered outside his residence and shouted slogans against government for his 'failure to provide security'.

nodes.description: 选举委员会宣布推迟PK-78选区原定选举
nodes.support_text: Following the incident, the Election Commission of Pakistan postponed the polls for PK-78, constituency from which Bilour was to contest election.

nodes.description: 7月11日，KPK警察部署9个警力单位加强城市管控
nodes.support_text: Nine units of Police and Quick Reaction Forces (QRF) were deployed at all entry and exit points of the city.

nodes.description: TTP正式宣称对2018年7月10日爆炸负责
nodes.support_text: Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) claimed responsibility for the bombing calling the assassination of Bilour 'a revenge of previous government'.

nodes.description: Haroon Bilour因爆炸受伤后在医院死亡
nodes.support_text: As his vehicle arrived, a loud explosion occurred. Bilour suffered serious injuries and was shifted to hospital where he succumbed to his wounds.
As his vehicle arrived, a loud explosion occurred. Bilour suffered serious injuries and was shifted to hospital where he succumbed to his wounds.

nodes.description: IG KPK Mohammad Tahir组建七人调查团队
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：IG KPK Mohammad Tahir组建七人调查团队

nodes.description: IG KPK Mohammad Tahir指示团队提交报告
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：IG KPK Mohammad Tahir指示团队提交报告

nodes.description: 警方在城市内开展突袭行动
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：警方在城市内开展突袭行动

nodes.description: 塔利班警告安全部队将遭进一步袭击
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：塔利班警告安全部队将遭进一步袭击

edges.support_text: The leaders of Awami National Party (ANP) have frequently been ambushed by militants. In December 2012, Bashir Ahmad Bilour, leader of ANP and Haroon Bilour's father, was killed by a suicide bomber.
The motive behind the assault was to kill the ANP leader Haroon Bilour. Bilour was to contest the next elections from PK-78.
As his vehicle arrived, a loud explosion occurred. Bilour suffered serious injuries and was shifted to hospital where he succumbed to his wounds.
On 12 July 2018, two days after the attack, another person succumbed to his injuries, bringing the number of deaths to 22.
Following the incident, the Election Commission of Pakistan postponed the polls for PK-78, constituency from which Bilour was to contest election.
The attack left 22 people dead and wounded 75 others. Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan claimed responsibility for the attack.
Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) claimed responsibility for the bombing calling the assassination of Bilour 'a revenge of previous government'.
爆炸后8小时，Lady Reading医院确认死亡人数从13人上升至21人
On 12 July 2018, two days after the attack, another person succumbed to his injuries, bringing the number of deaths to 22.
